body: After updating the Android appcompat library version to 25.0.0 and a few trial and errors, I have figured that the appcompat library version can be updated to the latest version which is currently 25.0.0 but the targetSdkVersion in the android/app/build.gradle file for the app has to be kept at 22 because of the new permission model that has been introduced in API level 23 which is not fully integrated into react-native yet. You may change the targetSdkVersion to 25 as well but you may need to add some code to explicitly request permissions for the phone resources which were granted automatically in API level 22 and below if the permission is present in the AndroidManifest.xml file.
title: Update android appcompat library version in react-native
